name: Space Defendor
description:
Full screen mode is recommended.

I've created this little space shooter game as a learning project. I hope you enjoy it.

First 25 levels are progressively harder then the strongest waves loop infinitely.

My 2. game on my programming learning journey.

Credits:

I'd like to thank Rick Davidson and Ben Tristem for their Unity 2D course on Udemy, I've learned everything I know from them.
